metadata.title: President, PM pay tribute to security forces for killing 5 terrorists in KP

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 16 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari and Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Monday paid tribute to the security forces for killing five terrorists of Indian proxy, Fitna al Khawarij in two different operations in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. In their separate statements, the president and the prime minister reiterated their resolve to completely eliminate Fitna al Khawarij from the country. "Operations against Fitna al Khawarij will continue till complete elimination of terrorism from the country," President Asif Ali Zardari said. PM Shehbaz Sharif said that the anti-human terrorists will have to pay heavy price for endangering the lives and property of innocent people.
